Package main.java.com.greendev.pragma.download

Interface Summary
Downloader This class defines the interface Downloader object.
 

Class Summary
Download This class represents an instance of a download.
DownloaderFactory Determines the type of downloader required for the specified download.
HttpDownloader This class represnets an Http Downloader.
LastDigitsChangerDownloader Downloader which changes the last two digits of the URL, trying to match which file is on the server.
RetryDownloader RetryDownloader provides re-attempt feature for apparent non existent downloads.
